safetyTips: orders placed before 4pm will be ready for collection the following day. Orders will be delivered on Thursday.
name: Your Little Green Shop
description: We are providing dried groceries, cooking oils, Sumac, Heatonomy, cleaning products and toiletries. Plus some household essentials. We are taking orders via our website for daily collection from the shop. Local deliveries are made on Thursdays. Order for collection by 4pm for following day collection.
